Sensing4U
Table of Contents

Enum ColorCategory

Namespace
Sensing4USensor.Models
Assembly
Sensing4USensor.dll

Represents the color category of a sensor reading, based on its value range.

public enum ColorCategory

Fields

Acceptable = 1

Sensor value is within the acceptable range.

High = 2

Sensor value is above the acceptable upper bound.

Low = 0

Sensor value is below the acceptable lower bound.
